entities.name: firenze
entities.description: Firenze is introduced as a newcomer, described as having white-blond hair and astonishingly blue eyes. He has the head and torso of a man joined to the palomino body of a horse.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as the one who is happy about Firenze's arrival, described as saying 'I think you'll find him suitable'.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is introduced as being thunderstruck by Firenze's appearance.

relationships.description: Dumbledore introduces Firenze to Umbridge, saying 'This is Firenze'.
Umbridge is thunderstruck by Firenze's appearance.
